feed.title: The blog of Instantbird's development - Comments: Instantbird talk at FOSDEM

entry.title: Posted by: patrickjdempsey
entry.summary: Thanks for posting your talk for us to read! The usage graph was really interesting. I’m betting Facebook support has really helped adoption… I’ve seen a dramatic shift away from people using traditional chat services and using Facebook and Twitter for that… as well as SMS/mobile messaging â€¦
entry.content: Thanks for posting your talk for us to read! The usage graph was really interesting. I’m betting Facebook support has really helped adoption… I’ve seen a dramatic shift away from people using traditional chat services and using Facebook and Twitter for that… as well as SMS/mobile messaging. Glad to see IB is making waves!
